item.title: GCP PDE Recipies
item.description: Intro This is a post in a series recording some notes as I’m studying for Google’s Professional Data Engineer Certification. In this post, I provide some common recipies which are commonly used in Google Cloud. Disclaimer Please read this disclaimer. GCP PDE Recipies The Classic Pub/Sub -> Dataflow -> BQ (batch inserts) Variations: Pub/Sub -> Dataflow -> BQ (streaming inserts) Pub/Sub -> Dataflow -> Bigtable -> BQ (querying Bigtable using federated query) For use-cases which require analytics and the low-latency afforded by Bigtable Uploading Data to Google Cloud gsutil on-prem.
